verses.verse: Now when these things were <S%H3615>done<s%>, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H5066>drew<s%> near unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, The <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, have not <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%>, doing according to their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, even of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, the <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%>, the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%>, the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>.

For they have <S%H5375>taken<s%> of their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for themselves and for their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, so that the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> have <S%H6148>mingled<s%> themselves with the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%>: <S%H3027>Yes<s%>, the hand of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers<s%> has been <S%H7223>chief<s%> in this <S%H4604>trespass<s%>.

And when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, I <S%H7167>tore<s%> my <S%H899>garment<s%> and my <S%H4598>robe<s%>, and plucked <S%H4803>off<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%> and of my <S%H2206>beard<s%>, and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> <S%H8074>confounded<s%>.

Then were <S%H622>assembled<s%> unto me every one that <S%H2730>trembled<s%> at the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because of the <S%H4604>trespass<s%> of them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%>; and I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8074>confounded<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>oblation<s%>.

And at the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>oblation<s%> I arose <S%H6965>up<s%> from my <S%H8589>humiliation<s%>, even with my <S%H899>garment<s%> and my <S%H899>robe<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%>; and I <S%H3766>fell<s%> upon my <S%H1290>knees<s%>, and spread <S%H6566>out<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>;

and I <S%H559>said<s%>, O my <S%H430>God<s%>, I am <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>blush<s%> to lift <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H430>you<s%>, my God; for our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> are <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H4605>over<s%> our <S%H7218>head<s%>, and our <S%H819>guiltiness<s%> is grown <S%H1431>up<s%> unto the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.

Since the <S%H3117>days<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> we have been <S%H1419>exceedingly<s%> <S%H819>guilty<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>; and for our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have <S%H4428>we<s%>, our kings, and our <S%H3548>priests<s%>, been <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%>, to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, to <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, and to <S%H961>plunder<s%>, and to <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of <S%H6440>face<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And now for a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7281>moment<s%> <S%H8467>grace<s%> has been showed from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H7604>leave<s%> us a remnant to <S%H6413>escape<s%>, and to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H3489>nail<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, that our <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H215>lighten<s%> our <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4241>reviving<s%> in our <S%H5659>bondage<s%>.

For we are <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>; yet our <S%H430>God<s%> has not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> us in our <S%H5659>bondage<s%>, but has <S%H5186>extended<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> unto us in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H4241>reviving<s%>, to set <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, and to <S%H5975>repair<s%> the <S%H2723>ruins<s%> <S%H5414>there<s%>, and to give us a <S%H1447>wall<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
And <S%H430>now<s%>, O our God, what shall we <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5800>this<s%>? for we have forsaken your <S%H4687>commandments<s%>,

which you have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H776>land<s%>, unto which you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5079>it<s%>, is an unclean <S%H776>land<s%> through the <S%H5079>uncleanness<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%>, through their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, which have <S%H4390>filled<s%> it from one <S%H6310>end<s%> to <S%H6310>another<s%> with their <S%H2932>filthiness<s%>:

now therefore <S%H5414>give<s%> not your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, neither <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, nor <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> or their <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>; that you may be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and leave it for an <S%H3423>inheritance<s%> to your <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> all that is <S%H935>come<s%> upon us for our <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4639>deeds<s%>, and for our <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H819>guilt<s%>, seeing that you our <S%H430>God<s%> have <S%H2820>punished<s%> us <S%H4295>less<s%> than our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H5414>deserve<s%>, and have given us such a <S%H6413>remnant<s%>,

shall we <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6565>break<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and join in <S%H2859>affinity<s%> with the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that do these <S%H8441>abominations<s%>? would not you be <S%H599>angry<s%> with us until you had <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H7611>us<s%>, so that there should be no remnant, nor any to <S%H6413>escape<s%>?

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, you are <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; for we are left a <S%H7604>remnant<s%> that is <S%H6413>escaped<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>: <S%H6440>behold<s%>, we are before you in our <S%H819>guiltiness<s%>; for none can <S%H5975>stand<s%> before you because of <S%H6440>this<s%>.
